title: Gilded dragonhide armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Gilded dragonhide armour offers similar offensive bonuses and notably higher defensive bonuses than the green dragonhide armour, and is a possible reward from completing elite Treasure Trails.

content:
A player wearing gilded dragonhide armour.

Gilded dragonhide armour offers similar offensive bonuses and notably higher defensive bonuses than the green dragonhide armour, and is a possible reward from completing elite Treasure Trails.

While most pieces of the armour are available in the free-to-play worlds, the coif is a members-only item.
